name: FlyHi
description:
Instructions :-

 Just click on the Forward button once and you are good to go. (No need to hold it)

Press/Hold Brake button once to stop going forward and hold it for going reverse on ground.

Kill as many spaceships as you can as they keep coming in this city.

Increase your health by taking the life of the dead spaceships.

Let's see how far you can go.
